name: AnimalSoundsGame
0:
”Alexa, launch Animal Sounds Game.”
”Alexa, open Animal Sounds Game.”
”Alexa, load Animal Sounds Game.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal sounds game
des:
"Animal Sounds Game" is a fun game that you can play with Alexa. She will play one of 40 different animal sounds and you will have to guess the animal. You can try to get through all 40 sounds and she will keep track of how many times you guessed correctly. 

During the game, you can say, "I give up" to go to the next animal sound. You can also say "Stop" to quit. 

To begin playing say, "Alexa, launch Animal Sounds Game."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
